title: In addition to providing for pressurization and indications,…
caption_en: In addition to providing for pressurization and indications, the also - provides discrete outputs for related CAS messages, - activates the emergency pressurization system ft),

title: These output signals are independently generated by the left…
caption_en: These output signals are independently generated by the left and right channels of the

title: The maximum cabin altitude is ft. If the is unable to contro…
caption_en: The maximum cabin altitude is ft. If the is unable to control the cabin altitude and if it increases and reaches a Caution CAS message CABIN ALTITUDE is displayed together with the above warnings.

title: If the cabin altitude continues to climb to the emergency pr…
caption_en: If the cabin altitude continues to climb to the emergency pressurization system is automatically activated. A Caution CAS message LR EMER PRESS ON is displayed together with the above warnings.

title: If the cabin altitude continues to climb to the above warnin…
caption_en: If the cabin altitude continues to climb to the above warnings are activated. The Learjet 46 master warning system provides the aural voice message CABIN ALTITUDE' in addition to standard airplane annunciations and warning tones.

title: If the cabin altitude further climbs to the cabin altitude l…
caption_en: If the cabin altitude further climbs to the cabin altitude limiters will be activated. This will cause both the outflow valves to close in an attempt to hold the cabin altitude.

title: When the cabin altitude reaches the passenger oxygen system …
caption_en: When the cabin altitude reaches the passenger oxygen system is automatically activated and the masks deploy. The emergency lighting system is also activated.

title: Pressurization Protection and Warnings (Delta P) For protect…
caption_en: Pressurization Protection and Warnings (Delta P) For protection against over-pressurization, when the differential pressure reaches psid in the Automatic mode of control, the caution CAS message CAB DELTA P is displayed together with the above protection features.

title: However, if the is in the Manual mode of control, the cautio…
caption_en: However, if the is in the Manual mode of control, the caution CAS message CAB DELTA P is displayed only when the differential pressure reaches psi differential. The other features are as shown.

title: Negative Pressure Relief If the outside atmospheric pressure…
caption_en: Negative Pressure Relief If the outside atmospheric pressure is greater than the inside cabin pressure by psid (negative pressure), both the outflow valves will open. This is also accompanied by the caution CAS message CAB DELTAP.
